data.actual_result: It's on "Don't delete any" rather than "24 hours"
data.expected_result: It should be set on 24 hours like on desktop and iOS
data.short_description: On the ban modal, the default message pruning option is set on "Don't delete any" while on desktop and ios it's on 24 hours.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you can ban users in - Open the profile - Press ban - Observe the "Delete message history" option
